mapper.select:
select seq, ref, step, depth, id, title, content, wdate, readcount, org, filename, newfname, category, del from (select row_number()over(order by ref desc, step asc) as rnum, seq, ref, step, depth, id, title, content, wdate, readcount, org, filename, newfname, category, del from busybee_bbs where 1=1
and title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
and content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
and id=#{search} and del=0
order by ref desc, step asc) a where rnum between ${start} and ${end}

select ifnull(count(*), 0) from busybee_bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where id=#{search}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO busybee_bbs(`ref`, step, `depth`, id, title, content, wdate, readcount, org, filename, newfname, category, del) VALUES((select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from busybee_bbs b), 0, 0, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{org}, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, #{category}, 0)
